testCase.name: join flat arrays with primitive ksqldb types and custom delimiters
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, BOOLEANARRAY ARRAY<BOOLEAN>, INTARRAY ARRAY<INT>, BIGINTARRAY ARRAY<BIGINT>, DOUBLEARRAY ARRAY<DOUBLE>, DECIMALARRAY ARRAY<DECIMAL(5,2)>, STRINGARRAY ARRAY<STRING>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, ARRAY_JOIN(BOOLEANARRAY,'|'), ARRAY_JOIN(INTARRAY,'?'), ARRAY_JOIN(BIGINTARRAY,';'), ARRAY_JOIN(DOUBLEARRAY,' '), ARRAY_JOIN(DECIMALARRAY,'#'), ARRAY_JOIN(STRINGARRAY,'_') FROM TEST;
